doc:
Harold Peary https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harold_Peary 0 Harold (Hal) Peary (July 25, 1908 – March 30, 1985) was an American actor, comedian and singer in radio, films, television, and animation remembered best as Throckmorton P. Gildersleeve, a supporting character on radio's Fibber McGee and Molly that moved to its own radio hit, The Great Gildersleeve, the first known spinoff hit in American broadcasting history. Harold ( Hal ) Peary ( July_25_,_1908 – March_30_,_1985 ) was an_American_actor_,_comedian_and_singer in radio , films , television , and animation remembered best as Throckmorton_P._Gildersleeve , a_supporting_character on radio 's_Fibber_McGee_and_Molly that moved to its_own_radio_hit , The_Great_Gildersleeve , the_first_known_spinoff_hit in American_broadcasting_history .
